dcterms:description: CybORG is an AI gym and research platform providing a flexible scenario-driven environment backed by both simulated and emulated networks, specifically designed for training defensive RL-based agents. It has hosted competitive public challenges that motivate the development of autonomous agents.
dcterms:title: CybORG

dcterms:creator: TTCP CAGE Working Group
dcterms:description: The CAGE challenge provides a MARL research environment for developing autonomous defensive capabilities for an ad-hoc network of drones compromised by malware. It tasks competitors with maintaining communication bandwidth despite disruptive attacks.
dcterms:title: CAGE Challenge
